::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| message: false
library(here)
```

```
here() starts at /Users/xolanisibande-dev/Papers/US_EM_MPS_spillover
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| message: false
source(here("notebooks", "packages_script.R"))
```
:::





Importing functions:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
source(here("notebooks", "functions", "fx_plot.R"))
```
:::






Importing data:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
surprises_wide_tbl <- read_excel(here("notebooks","data", "factors2023.xlsx")) |> 
  mutate(
    Date = as.Date(paste0(year,"-", month, "-", day))
  ) |> 
  relocate(
    Date,
    .before = year
  ) |> 
  dplyr::select(
    -c(year, month, day, `-LSAP`)
  ) 

surprises_tbl <- 
  surprises_wide_tbl |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -Date,
    names_to = "Series",
    values_to = "Value"
  )
```
:::






EDA:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
surprises_tbl |> 
  group_by(Series) |> 
  skim()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

|Value         |FG     |         0|             1|    0| 1.00| -3.91| -0.35| 0.05| 0.42| 5.03|▁▂▇▁▁ |

:::





Graphing:





::: {#cell-fig-surprises .cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-surprises
#| fig-cap: "Monetary policy surprises"
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 4

surprises_gg <- 
  surprises_tbl |> 
  fx_plot(
    variables_color = 4
  )

surprises_gg
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Monetary policy surprises](02_surprises_data_files/figure-html/fig-surprises-1.png){#fig-surprises fig-align='center' width=576}
:::
:::





Export:





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
artifacts_surprises_data <- list (
  surprises_tbl = surprises_tbl,
  surprises_wide_tbl = surprises_wide_tbl,
  surprises_gg = surprises_gg
)

write_rds(artifacts_surprises_data, file = here("notebooks", "outputs", 
                                                "artifacts_surprises_data.rds"))
```
:::
